overview:
Jack Hii is the VP of Operations and Co-Founder of Open Dynamics Inc. and the Director of Operations at The Media Shoppe Bhd. He has more than 22 years of working experience, which more than 12 years were in the enterprise software development capacity. He was an entrepreneur and founder of 2 software start-ups in the late 1990s.

He graduated with a Bachelor of Arts in Urban and Rural Planning from University of Alberta, Canada in 1997.

His working experience encompasses the following areas in retail operations, merchandising, desktop publishing, creative design, business development, project management, software product research and development, event management, human resource and business administrations.

In his capacity as the Head of Product Development and Research Department in The Media Shoppe Berhad, his team produced the following award winning software:

  • COMDEX ASIA 2001 The Best Software Product Award - tmsPUBLISHER
  • APICTA (Asia Pacific ICT Award) 2004 Best General Application for - tmsEKP

In 2007, he won a MYR50k grant for the MSC Malaysia IP Creators Challenge.
